FAQ.trending-desc: Every week, we present the most searched and discussed questions by users. This week's trending questions cover interesting topics such as the latest technology innovations, productivity tips, and health trends. Explore answers from experts and gain valuable insights to enhance your knowledge.
FAQ.freq-desc: We often receive questions from clients about various important topics. The most frequently asked questions include how to use our services, the shipping process, and return policies. We always strive to provide clear and informative answers to help clients better understand our services.

trendingFaq.question: What makes UNION CREATIVE DESIGN different from other companies in the same field?
trendingFaq.answer: UNION CREATIVE DESIGN prioritizes principles of GOOD CORPORATE GOVERNANCE, integrity, creativity, and excellent service. With high-quality human resources and cutting-edge technology, we always strive to provide the best solutions for our clients.

trendingFaq.question: How is the consultation process for interior design projects conducted?
trendingFaq.answer: The consultation process begins with understanding the client’s needs and preferences. Our team then develops ideas and creative solutions tailored to the client’s desires, followed by detailed planning and project execution.

trendingFaq.question: What services does UNION CREATIVE DESIGN offer in the field of promotion/advertising?
trendingFaq.answer: We offer promotion services both outdoor such as neon boxes, billboards, neon signs, and indoor through radio, television, mass media, and exhibitions.

trendingFaq.question: Does UNION CREATIVE DESIGN also provide electrical installation services?
trendingFaq.answer: Yes, we provide electrical installation services for offices and homes, including electrical consultations.

trendingFaq.question: How to contact UNION CREATIVE DESIGN to start a project?
trendingFaq.answer: You can contact our contact persons: Helik at +62 813 8704 S066, Irpan at +62 857 0951 a6!, or Irwansyah at +62 811 885 8059. We will be ready to assist you in starting your project.

freqFaq.question: How does UNION CREATIVE DESIGN ensure the quality of their work?
freqFaq.answer: We ensure quality through good management, competent human resources, and the use of the latest technology in every project. We also always strive to meet industry standards that are high-quality and recognized.

freqFaq.question: What services does UNION CREATIVE DESIGN provide in the field of furniture?
freqFaq.answer: We provide partition making services, drop ceiling, booths, displays, as well as office and home furniture such as chairs, sofas, tables, and cabinets. We also offer layout and interior design services.

freqFaq.question: Does UNION CREATIVE DESIGN also supply materials for exterior projects?
freqFaq.answer: Yes, we are a supplier of materials for interiors, exteriors, promotion/advertising, mechanical, and electrical projects.

freqFaq.question: How does UNION CREATIVE DESIGN handle projects with tight deadlines?
freqFaq.answer: With experience and expert human resources, we always prioritize time and cost efficiency in every project. We use cutting-edge technology to ensure all projects are completed on time and within budget.

freqFaq.question: Does UNION CREATIVE DESIGN only serve large companies or also individuals?
freqFaq.answer: We serve various clients, both large companies, institutions, and individuals. We are ready to provide the best services according to our clients’ needs.

AboutSection.description: We are here to turn your dream home into reality. With over 10 years of experience, we are the leading solution for the best home design.

1.title: HOME DESIGN CONSULTATION
1.description: Create your dream home with our team of experts. Get personalized design solutions that fit your needs and lifestyle.

2.title: 3D & 2D INTERIOR ROOM DESIGN
2.description: Visualize your dream home with detailed and realistic 3D & 2D designs. Experience the feeling of exploring your home before it's built.

3.title: CUSTOM INTERIOR FURNITURE
3.description: Complete your home with high-quality custom furniture designed specifically to maximize the function and aesthetics of your space.

1.title: DESIGN CONSULTATION WITH CLIENTS
1.description: We begin by understanding your needs and design vision through in-depth consultation.

2.title: CREATION OF HOME DESIGN PROTOTYPE
2.description: We develop an initial design prototype based on the consultation results, providing a visual representation of your home concept.

3.title: HOME DESIGN DEVELOPMENT
3.description: The design prototype is refined with more specific details, ensuring the final design meets your expectations and needs.

missionItems.1: Providing comprehensive and high-quality one-stop smart living solutions.
missionItems.2: Creating unique, personal homes that reflect the owner's personality.
missionItems.3: Utilizing the latest technology and quality materials for the best results.
missionItems.4: Building long-term relationships with clients based on trust and satisfaction.

OurTeam.title: Our Team

CTAWhatsApp.quote: "WORK HARD & GREAT QUALITY IS OUR PRIORITY"

ServicesPage.title: OUR SERVICES
ServicesPage.subtitle: Improving the quality of life for customers through designs that meet aspects of aesthetics, functionality, and durability, realized in a concept with high artistic value

services.title: Consultation
services.description: Need ideas, advice, guidance, or professional answers for the best design of your property? Accompanied directly by architectural and interior experts, you can get all the input, inspiration, and guidance on design concepts that exceed your expectations. Get a free consultation from us for the best dream home solutions.

services.title: Design Style Expert
services.description: Starting from modern minimalist themes, Scandinavian, transitional, classic, industrial, and others - the Union Creative Design team is trained to stay up-to-date by honing their respective design skills. Regularly involved in various property projects, both residential, commercial, landscape, and others, making us experienced experts in realizing all your dream properties.

services.title: 3D Visualization
services.description: Using 3D design for realistic visualization, clients will get a multi-perspective view, including exterior and interior. All details will be presented completely and meticulously, without missing any observation and professional input from our team.

services.title: Safety First
services.description: Both the safety aspects of the client's property and workers, we have construction standards that adhere to the best and safest field practices. With proven work procedures and construction methods, we believe that safety is one of the main keys in completing a project that truly satisfies all parties.

services.title: High Professionalism
services.description: The beginning of professionalism is maintaining the greatest trust that has been given by each of our clients. All construction team personnel hold a commitment to professionalism, including time discipline and work efficiency, which are reflections of working integrity.

services.title: Architectural Understanding
services.description: Our company only employs field workers who are skilled and tested in their fields. An experienced field supervisor is also always present to ensure all field work, including materials and work standards, meet the technical and client expectations.

PortofolioPage.title: Our Portofolio
PortofolioPage.subtitle: We are committed to providing the best service and satisfactory results. We work on every project wholeheartedly, because your happiness is our pride.

StyleQuiz.title: What is my interior design style?
StyleQuiz.subtitle: Discover the interior design style that matches your personality.
questions: What interior style do you like the most?
What is your favorite color for the walls of your main room?
What kind of furniture appeals to you the most?
How would you describe your ideal lighting?
What kind of home accessories do you like the most?

1.description: Modern style emphasizes minimalist design with clean lines and a neutral color palette. Functionality and simple aesthetics are the main focus.

2.description: Classic style is inspired by elegant and luxurious European design, with rich decorative ornaments and intricate details.

3.description: Scandinavian style is known for its simplicity, functionality, and natural beauty. It uses a lot of wood elements, bright colors, and open spaces.

4.description: Industrial style features raw materials such as exposed brick, metal, and unfinished wood. The design often looks masculine and utilitarian.

stepTwo.title: Number of Rooms to be Designed

Footer.cta-text: LETS CHANGE YOUR OWN HOME INTERIOR DESIGN NOW
Footer.intro-desc: Welcome to UNION CREATIVE DESIGN, your trusted partner in creating innovative and high-quality interior and construction solutions. Located in the heart of Bandung, West Java, with a branch office in Cimahi Selatan, we are committed to enhancing your business environment with professionalism and expertise.
